competencyText.en-us: Grade 6-8
Foreign Service
Demonstrate an understanding of the foreign service career pathway.
Define and use proper terminology associated with the foreign service career pathway.
Describe some of the careers available in the foreign service career pathway.
Identify common characteristics of the careers in the foreign service career pathway.
Research the history of the foreign service career pathway and describe how the careers have evolved and impacted society.
Identify skills required to successfully enter a career in the foreign service career pathway.
Describe technologies associated in careers within the foreign service career pathway.
Supplemental
Identify and explore careers in the Government & Public Administration cluster.
Identify the pathways in the Government & Public Administration career cluster and the careers in each pathway.
Describe the types of places that employ individuals who have careers in the Government & Public Administration career cluster.
Describe the variety of tasks performed by individuals who have careers in the Government & Public Administration career cluster.
List the skills, abilities, and talents needed for careers in the Government & Public Administration career cluster.
Identify the level of training and education required for careers in the Government & Public Administration career cluster.
Research a career in the Government & Public Administration career cluster and present findings to the class.
Apply math, science, and reading skills in the completion of a project or activity related to the Government & Public Administration career cluster.
Apply concepts of geography used in government and public administration.
Identify graphic tools and technologies used in government and public administration occupations.
Locate places and regions using maps and globes.
Create maps and graphs to display geographic information.
Describe communication formats used to facilitate the exchange of ideas in government and public administration.
Identify public issues at the local, state, and national levels.
Debate a public issue of importance to your community.
Debate a public issue impacting the state or nation.
Make a presentation explaining the impact of a national public issue on your local community.
Conduct an interview on a state public issue.
Discuss the importance of health, safety, and environmental management systems in government and public administration.
Identify possible risk of injury or illness in the workplace.
Identify safety signs and symbols.
Create and present a solution to address risk of injury or illness in the workplace.
Identify hazards in the workplace.
Identify the government agencies responsible for providing a safe workplace.
Create a presentation for employees on preparedness for a safe environment.
Develop and present persuasive arguments on political or social topics.
Identify differing political or social perspectives on a public policy impacting the local community.
Research and present a perspective on a policy.
Debate a public policy.
Governance
Demonstrate an understanding of the governance career pathway.
Define and use proper terminology associated with the governance career pathway.
Describe some of the careers available in the governance career pathway.
Identify common characteristics of the careers in the governance career pathway.
Research the history of the governance career pathway and describe how the associated careers have evolved and impacted society.
Identify skills required to successfully enter a career in the governance career pathway.
Describe technologies associated in careers within the governance career pathway.
Discuss the governmental policy making process.
Explain the difference between the legislative branch and the executive branch of government.
Explain the role of the legislature.
Explain the role of congress.
Discuss how bills become laws.
Identify organizations that engage in the political process.
Develop a public policy and explain the benefits to the community.

Demonstrate an understanding of the national security career pathway.
Define and use proper terminology associated with the national security career pathway.
Describe some of the careers available in the national security career pathway.
Identify common characteristics of the careers in the national security career pathway.
Research the history of the national security career pathway and describe how the careers have evolved and impacted society.
Identify skills required to successfully enter a career in the national security career pathway.
Describe technologies associated in careers within the national security career pathway.

Identify common characteristics of the careers in the public management and administration career pathway.
Research the history of the public management and administration career pathway and describe how the careers have evolved and impacted society.
Identify skills required to successfully enter a career in the public management and administration career pathway.
Describe technologies associated in careers within the public management and administration career pathway.
Describe the functions of government and public administration.
Discuss the various forms of governance.
Define the concepts of authority, rights, and responsibility in government and public administration.
